enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Juniors & Seniors
title: SoC COMM_ST 395-0-20 Topics in Communication Studies

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Over the course of the quarter, students learn foundational knowledge about the history and impact of popular culture and new media, distinct ways that new media forms impact us socially and culturally, how to study new media environments as popular culture forms, and how to derive insights from qualitative, ethnographic data.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Boellstorff, Tom. Coming of Age in Second Life: An Anthropologist Explores the Virtually Human

subject: COMM_ST
